text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump WOW, Your father really MADE A FOOL OF HIMSELF On his "press briefing" today  AKA "THE TRUMP COMEDY HOUR" It was ALL ABOUT HIM AGAIN and he had NO NEW INFORMATION ABOUT THE CORONAVIRUS!!
